job.title: Software Engineer I
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: ltstronggtltugtDescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt Shutterfly were all about people  bringing them together making them feel welcome and connecting them to experiences We make technology and best in class customer service we help our customers and each other share lifes joyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPosition SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt Shutterfly we value results through teamwork and a cando attitude We are seeking a Software Engineer Full Stack for our Fulfillment Service Platform This is a critical individual contributor role for software development with enterprise level software technologies JavaJ2EE REST Services Frontend frameworks Angular or React NodeJS MySQL and AWSltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for Software Engineers who enjoy solving complex problems driving business value through rapid innovation and enjoy complete ownership Cradle to Grave Design Dev Infrastructure Release Support of the assigned domainltbrgtltbrgtIf you love the fun and excitement of working in an entrepreneurial collaborative and agile software development environment with cuttingedge technologies then send us your resume todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDesign development test and deployment of highly scalable highreliability software UI services and backend in a businesscritical enterprise environmentltligtltligtWork with Product leadership to clarify requirements design technical solutions and develop complex featuresltligtltligtPartner across engineering teams to deliver functionalityltligtltligtCollaborate with other developers to plan releases and ensure the team delivers on the committed planltligtltligtParticipate in design and code reviews across the team adhering to software best practicesltligtltligtSupport and debug of critical transactions in the Shutterfly order processing flow Work with stakeholders to address questions and unblock issues with Order FulfillersltligtltligtPerform scalability and performance analysis as neededltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkills ampamp QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBSMS in Computer Science or equivalentltligtltligt1 years academic or professional software development experience in enterprise technologies eg Java REST Services Spring Kubernetes NodeJS MySQL XML Go and AWSltligtltligt1 years of academic or professional experience developing effective APIs and REST services with understanding of serverside and middletier technologies relational databasesSQLltligtltligt1 years of academic or professional experience with JavaScript including concepts like asynchronous programming closures types jQuery and ES6ltligtltligt1 years of academic or professional experience in UI development using modern frontend frameworks Angular2 React Vue and web markup including HTML5 CSS3ltligtltligtExcellent design coding and analytical skillsltligtltligtExcellent problemsolving and software debug skillsltligtltligtExcellent communication and teamwork skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred
